mapper.select: select um.id, um.parent_id parentId, um.create_time createTime, um.title, um.level, um.sort, um.name, um.icon, um.hidden from ums_admin_role_relation uarr join ums_role_menu_relation urmr on urmr.role_id = uarr.role_id join ums_menu um on um.id = urmr.menu_id where uarr.admin_id = #{adminId};
